sponsored_ad.title: Save 20% on Organic Produce
sponsored_ad.description: Limited time offer on all fresh organic fruits and vegetables. Shop now!

rewards.title: Fresh Fruits Bundle
rewards.detail: Get a seasonal fruit basket at 30% off
how_to_claim: The Grocery On Wheels app is a smart, intuitive platform designed to enhance last-mile grocery delivery through our mobile van network.
Select the Fresh Fruits Bundle from your rewards page.
Apply the discount at checkout when purchasing any fruit basket worth $20 or more.
Ensure you have a minimum order value of $50 to redeem this reward.
rewards.terms_conditions: Valid on purchases above $50. Cannot be combined with other offers.

rewards.title: Dairy Products Discount
how_to_claim: Tap on this reward to activate it before checkout.
Add dairy products to your cart totaling at least $15.
Discount will be automatically applied at checkout.
Offer valid once per customer.
rewards.terms_conditions: Valid on dairy products only. Minimum purchase of $15 required.

rewards.title: Breakfast Cereals Offer
rewards.detail: Buy 1 Get 1 Free on selected cereals
how_to_claim: Browse the cereals section in our app.
Add two of the same participating cereal products to your cart.
The discount will be applied automatically during checkout.
Limited to one free item per order.
rewards.terms_conditions: Applicable only on marked items. Second item must be of equal or lesser value.

rewards.title: Baking Essentials
how_to_claim: This offer has expired and can no longer be claimed.
Check back soon for new offers on baking goods.
rewards.terms_conditions: This offer is no longer valid.

rewards.title: Healthy Snacks Pack
how_to_claim: Add the Healthy Snacks Pack to your cart.
Proceed to checkout and the delivery fee will be waived.
Minimum order value must be $30.
Available for all delivery slots.
rewards.terms_conditions: Valid on orders above $30. Free delivery applies to standard delivery slots only.

rewards.title: Kitchen Essentials
how_to_claim: Browse the kitchenware section in our app.
Add eligible products to your cart.
Apply this reward at checkout to receive 10% off.
Maximum discount is $20.
rewards.terms_conditions: Excludes electrical appliances. Maximum discount of $20 per order.
